resource.name: City of Fort Collins Building IDs
resource.description:
List of unique building IDs that connect to building footprints.

Buildings here are those covered by Building Energy and Water Scoring ordinance.
columns_description: Metadata field for record hash. This field is a SHA-1 hash of all other fields in the record, used for validation of record uniqueness.
Square footage of the building, including any additional improvements as part of the same footprint
Unique identifier that differentiates between campuses. 'Campus' is used here in the same way as in ENERGY STAR Portfolio Manager.
Unique building ID that identifies separate buildings on the same campus
Metadata field for a suggested sort order. Sort this column in ascending order to order the dataset the way it was intended from the source system.
